name: Puwang
description:
Puwang is a fast paced shoot 'em up where you control a spaceship in a battle against paper made enemies on a notebook arena.

Survive as much time as you can in these intense and frenetic battles and beat your friends scores.

Featuring a level system for the ship that will progressively become stronger and faster as gain XP from killing enemies this will prove essential against the ever growing hordes of enemies.

Picking up PowerUps that enemies drops to gain you more speed or different weapons.

Features:
-Different weapons for different occasions, pick them wisely.
-GameCenter - Leaderboards for Best Times and Best Score
-Support for Retina display
-Support for the iPhone 5 new 4-inch display
-Universal App
